document.full_text: in a season where nothing has gone right, the winless boston red sox found a new way to lose thursday. a couple of them, in fact.
document.title: red sox slip to 0-6, lose 1-0 to indians on bunt
lines_and_colors: in a season where nothing has gone right, the winless boston red sox found a new way to lose thursday. a couple of them, in fact.
